snippet: Mr. Miller, who was named as White House communications director by Donald J. Trump two days ago, has told the president-elect that he will not take the job....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Miller, who was named as White House communications director by Donald J. Trump two days ago, has told the president-elect that he will not take the job.

headline.main: Jason Miller Backs Out of White House Communications Job Under Trump
headline.print_headline: Pick for a Top Liaison Backs Out
